articles.title: 'You just married Scarlett Johansson': Colin Jost debuts his wedding ring on 'SNL' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Colin Jost debuted his wedding ring on "Weekend Update" in his first "Saturday Night Live" appearance since marrying Scarlett Johansson last week.
